contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox broadcasting network |name=Yahoo! Sports Radio |logo=[[File:Yahoo! Sports Radio logo.png|200px]] |type=[[Sports radio|Sports]] |airdate={{Start date|2011|08|01}} |country=[[United States]] |parent=Gow Broadcasting<br><small>(distribution)</small><br>[[Yahoo! Sports]]<br><small>(content)</small> |former_names=Sporting News Radio |webcast=[http://www.yahoosportsradio.com/listen/ Listen Live] |website=[http://www.yahoosportsradio.com/ Yahoo! Sports Radio] }} '''Yahoo! Sports Radio''' is a [[sports radio]] [[Radio network|network]] that is distributed by Gow Broadcasting.<ref name="Gow YSR">{{cite web|title=Yahoo! Sports and Gow Broadcasting Hit the Radio Airwaves with Yahoo! Sports Radio|url=http://investor.yahoo.net/releasedetail.cfm?ReleaseID=595414|publisher=[[Yahoo!]]|accessdate=11 February 2013}}</ref> The network premiered on Monday, August 1, 2011, rebranded from [[Sporting News Radio]].<ref name="SNR to YSR">{{cite web|title=Sporting News Radio becomes Yahoo Sports Radio|url=http://www.chron.com/business/article/Sporting-News-Radio-becomes-Yahoo-Sports-Radio-2080203.php|publisher=[[Houston Chronicle]]|accessdate=11 March 2013|author=David Barron|date=August 1, 2011}}</ref> Programming is broadcast in the United States on local radio affiliates. It is also streamed and available for download at YahooSportsRadio.com, with the Yahoo! Sports Radio mobile application, and at the websites of affiliates.<ref name=Affiliates>{{cite web|title=Affiliates|url=http://www.yahoosportsradio.com/affiliates/|publisher=Yahoo! Sports Radio|accessdate=20 November 2012}}</ref> Yahoo! Sports Radio programming and hosts include:<ref name=Programming>{{cite web|title=Show Schedule|url=http://www.yahoosportsradio.com/lineup/|publisher=Yahoo! Sports Radio|accessdate=13 November 2012}}</ref> *[[Steve Czaban]] *Marty Tirrell *[[Travis Rodgers]] *John Harris *[[Geoff Ketchum]] *[[Dan Wetzel]] *[[Pat Forde]] *Sean Pendergast ==References== {{reflist}} {{Yahoo! Sports Radio stations}} {{American broadcast radio}} {{Sports networks in the United States}} [[Category:Sports radio networks in the United States]]
